Description: Wooded landscape with the Rest on the Flight into Egypt; a stream falling into pools of water at left, a path beside it running through the forest, view of a lake with villa beyond at right, the Holy Family resting on a bank in the foreground Pen and black ink, with grey wash
Curator's comments: Not described in Louisa Wood Ruby, 'Paul Bril: The Drawings' (Pictura Nova IV), Turnhout, 1999.
Bibliographic references: Popham (D & F) 1932 / Dutch and Flemish drawings of the XV and XVI centuries (6) (as attributed to Bril)
